resources.string: The response received was unknown or blank / null.
Icon URL should not be Null or Blank & should start with http://
Header Image URL should start with http://
Title & description should not be Null or Blank.
Interstitial Image URL should not be Null or Blank & should start with http://
When using the constructor with @RawRes param, Icon must be a local drawable name (@drawable/logo) or start with http://
When using the constructor with @RawRes param, Header Image must be a local drawable name (@drawable/header) or start with http://
When using the constructor with @RawRes param, Interstitial Image must be a local drawable name (@drawable/interstitial) or start with http://
NativeAdView is Null. Either pass HouseAdsNativeView or a View object in setNativeAdView()
Call to Action View must be either a Button or a TextView
